name: ThoughtfulPinch
0:
”Alexa, ask thoughtful pinch what is the pinch of the day”
”Alexa, ask thoughtful pinch for today's thoughtful pinch”
”Alexa, ask thoughtful pinch for today's pinch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thoughtful pinch
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A thoughtful pinch can be a noun or a verb. As a noun, it is a small, inexpensive, thoughtful gift;
while as a verb it is the act of thinking of someone and giving them a small, inexpensive, thoughtful gift. 
Every Tuesday there’s a new reason to be thoughtful. 

Is today not Tuesday? No problem! The Thoughtful Pinch skill will let you know what today is, according to National Day Calendar. Find them on Facebook @NationalDayCalendar, on Twitter @NationalDayCal and Instagram @NatDayCal.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
